data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 1,286,700 citizens of Hà Tĩnh, Vietnam, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hà Tĩnh, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Hà Tĩnh, Vietnam.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Hà Tĩnh, Vietnam.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Over 89.82 percent of the people of Hà Tĩnh are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Chut people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Hà Tĩnh, Vietnam.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,155,660, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.section_summary:
the state of Hà Tĩnh, Vietnam has a population of 1,286,700.

We estimate Hà Tĩnh has 27,830 people who might know Jesus, 103,209 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,155,660 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Hà Tĩnh.
